amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike provisions in the bill that call on the President to expand the scope of the mission in Afghanistan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 114-571 to strike language that calls on the President to expand the scope of the mission in Afghanistan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 292, 1 Present (Roll no. 212).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 292, 1 Present (Roll no. 212).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Ellison.
